appName.message: Cursor michira - makanema ojambula pa mbewa yanu
appName.description: Mutu wa pulogalamuyi, wowonetsedwa mu store.

appDesc.message: Kuwonjezera zotsatira zoseketsa nthawi iliyonse mukasuntha mbewa yanu.Kuwonjezera uku kumapangitsa mbewa yanu kuyenda pangani zovuta.
appDesc.description: Mafotokozedwe a pulogalamuyi, omwe adawonetsedwa mu store.

startExtension.description: Mukadula, kukulitsa komwe kwathe ntchito mpaka kuwulitsa.

ratingBtn.description: Batani lotseguka zenera latsopano kuti muchepetse ogwiritsa ntchito.

askQuestion.description: Mauthenga achidziwitso omwe amagwiritsa ntchito omwe amasuta anayendera masiku atatu.

ratingQuestion.message: Zikomo posangalala ndi kusangalala!() Chonde chonde gwiritsani ntchito zowonjezera!
ratingQuestion.description: Mauthenga achidziwitso omwe amagwiritsa ntchito omwe amasuta anayendera masiku atatu.
